tool_description: API filter and censor bad words written in any way in your text
name: Smart bad words filter
title: Smart bad words filter

api_list.name: Censor text
api_list.description: Send you text in any format to get censored text and status
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://smart-bad-words-filter.p.rapidapi.com/censor"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smart-bad-words-filter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://smart-bad-words-filter.p.rapidapi.com/censor"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smart-bad-words-filter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
